# Data from `r dataset`

These data were accessed on `r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B %Y')`

## Size

```{r echo = FALSE}
set.seed(4812)
physical %>% 
  filter(site == dataset) %>% 
  select(site_brom.id, maxvol:catchment.area) %>% 
  sample_n(3) %>% 
  mutate(`*CONFIRMED*` = "    ") %>% 
  as.data.frame %>% 
  kable
```


## Initial chemistry

```{r echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
set.seed(4812)
physical %>% 
  filter(site == dataset) %>% 
  select(site_brom.id, turbidity.initial:chlorophyll.initial) %>% 
  sample_n(3) %>% 
  mutate(CONFIRMED = "    ") %>% 
  as.data.frame %>% 
  xtable %>% 
  print(type = 'latex',
          hline.after = 1:2,  # note we count the lines here.
          floating = FALSE)
```
